msgSnippet: Did you look under the documentation tab, there, you ll find the JUnit cookbook, which is a pretty good start, if you get your Java environment straight.

Did you look under the "documentation" tab, there, you'll find the JUnit
cookbook, which is a pretty good start, if you get your Java environment
straight.

regards
Philippe
  -----Original Message-----
  From: Ram Kumar [mailto:y_ramkumar@...]
  Sent: woensdag 30 mei 2001 16:33
  To: junit@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [junit] testing junit


  Hi,

  I am a new JUnit user and just downloaded JUnit and trying to work with
it. I could not find proper documentation about how to install JUnit and use
it, in JUnit site.

  Could any one suggest me where to find good documentation about JUnit?

  Awaiting your immediate reply.

  Thanks,

  Yamasani.
